item.title: Firebase Quickstart
item.description: Firebase makes app development faster âš¡, cheaper ðŸ’µ, and more enjoyable ðŸ˜€ for developers. The idea behind a Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) is to eliminate the need to write and maintain server-side code - things like user authentication, trusted API calls, security logic, database connections, traffic scaling, and the list goes on. These requirements take time, money, and add complexity to a project. The more resources you can invest in the frontend user experience, the more likely your app is to succeed.
